creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Make sure of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and go over your Medical Savings Account details, if you have one. View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help
descriptionShort: The Discovery app provides a convenient way to access your information

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
2019/20 tax certificates for medical schemes administered by Discovery Health are now available.
Vitality Health Tracker is now available for free to all members of medical schemes administered by Discovery Health. PLUS, get a fabric face mask or hand sanitiser on us when you start!
Members can now view and download a Hospital Claims Summary PDF of their recent hospital stay.

Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help
descriptionShort: The Discovery app provides a convenient way to access your information

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve made it easier to find your favourite Vitality Active Rewards partners or rewards by introducing categories. For Vitality users aged sixty five years and above, we now offer up to 25% discount on Vitality Active Rewards and exclusive benefits on health monitoring devices. Introducing an all new Vitality Drive with an enhanced dashboard for tracking your Vitality Drive points and cash back, as well as detailed trip feedback to help you maximise your new weekly and monthly drive goals.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Recent interactions will now keep a record of your conversations with Virtual Agent and provide a view of your documents uploaded via document submission or through logging a query in help.

title: Discovery

creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Make sure of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and go over your Medical Savings Account details, if you have one. View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help

View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help
descriptionShort: The Discovery app provides a convenient way to access your information

You can now access the Retirement Funds Member Zone through the Discovery app if you are a member of Discovery Retirement Funds.
Discovery Invest clients can update and confirm their details.
Discovery Insure clients can now enjoy a better visual experience so they can easily navigate through the app.
Updates to managed care programmes feature allowing members to view their premiere plus doctor
Member experience improvements to claims history

title: Discovery

creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Make sure of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and go over your Medical Savings Account details, if you have one. View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and general improvements.

title: Discovery

creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Make sure of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and go over your Medical Savings Account details, if you have one. View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help

View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Discovery Insure clients will now be able complete their pre-inspection by taking pictures of their vehicle or motorcycle using the Discovery app.

Discovery Insure has enhanced the ‘Submit a claim’ journey for car and home insurance clients. This includes enhancements to the Auto Approval feature which can now automatically approve tablet, smart watch and television claims.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Medical scheme members can now view and set up payments for outstanding contributions and amounts owing to the Scheme.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Discovery Insure clients can now add a vehicle onto their plan via the app with Instant Cover.

title: Discovery

creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Make sure of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and go over your Medical Savings Account details, if you have one. DiscoveryCard:

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You have access to Online Patient Communities to help you take a proactive approach to manage your health and chronic conditions.

Online patient communities are patient-led, online groups where patients, caregivers, doctors, researchers, and others share stories and offer support and information.

You can now complete your Vitality Age assessment directly from the Discovery app. The format of the assessment has also been updated to be easier and more convenient to complete

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Now payments are smart, instant, and seamless with Discovery Pay. You can instantly settle medical bills at participating healthcare providers, with Health payments from your linked Discovery Bank account. Your claims will be automatically paid, or you can scan the QR code on the invoice.

View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help
descriptionShort: The Discovery app provides a convenient way to access your information

title: Discovery

creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Make sure of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and go over your Medical Savings Account details, if you have one. View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months' claims, view your approved chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

DiscoveryCard:
View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

Discovery Insure:
View your policy details, view your Vitalitydrive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Discovery Vitality members with a qualifying Discovery Bank account can now start enjoying the next evolution of Vitality Active Rewards in the Discovery Bank app. All other members will continue to access the existing Vitality Active Rewards in the Discovery app.

It’s the same app but with a new look! We’ve moved our navigation to the bottom and made it easier to get to key features like Emergency Assist.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Clients with the Discovery Life Plan 3.0 can now engage directly with their Plan on the app, allowing them to have a comprehensive view of their benefits, as well as how they work. They can also interact with their Financial Rewards and see how Vitality engagement benefits them.

Exciting news! With the enhanced Vitality Drive programme, Discovery Insure clients can now earn up to R1,500 fuel cash back every month just for driving well.

Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest BP service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre location. Link your Gautrain card in order to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members on the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information – MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits & SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in on the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status please visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help

creator: Discovery Limited
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Health:
Check the details of your Discovery Health Plan benefits and Medical Savings Account. View your most recent healthcare service claim details, search through 12 months’ claims, view your approved cover for chronic conditions and track benefit usage. Search for a healthcare professional and view your health record. Compare the prices of medicines and their generic alternatives and view a summary of hospital claims.

Some of the Discovery Health features include:
• Care Programmes for managing chronic conditions
• The Emergency assist feature for quick access to emergency care
• Tools for tracking, managing and uploading health records
• Tools for mental health support, counselling services and addiction recovery programmes
• Medicine tracker to manage prescribed medicine

Discovery Vitality:
See your Vitality points and status, track your Vitality Active Rewards goal and more.

Some of the Vitality features include:
• Activity and fitness: Tracking steps, speed and heart rate
• Nutrition and weight management: Vitality HealthyWeight
• Sleep management: Tracking your sleep
• Stress management, relaxation, mental acuity: Tracking mindfulness

View your transactions, account balance and last statement, as well as your Discovery Miles, smart shopper points or cashback balance.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The newly enhanced Vitality HealthyFood benefit has arrived!

Vitality members can now earn rewards for shopping both in-store and online with our new partner, Checkers and Checkers Sixty60, as well as with Woolworths in-store and online, Woolies app and Woolies Dash.

Members can easily set up their new benefit, partner profile, or choose their primary partners by scanning a QR code at any HealthyFood partner.

Enjoy the benefits of healthier choices! Live life with Vitality.

View your policy details, view your Vitality Drive points, status and other driving information, and request emergency assistance. Take a picture of your car after an accident and send it to us to start the claims process. Search for the nearest bp service station or Tiger Wheel & Tyre outlet. Link your Gautrain card to get up to 50% of your spend back. Request a personal driver or taxi service.

Discovery Life:
View all your policy information.

Discovery Invest:
View your portfolio, including fund balances, and request to have a relevant document emailed to you.

Members of the following medical schemes will also have access to their scheme information: MMED, Naspers, LA Health, Tsogo, TFG, Quantum, Remedi, Anglovaal, Retail Medical Scheme, UKZN, BMW, Malcor, Wits and SABMAS.

The application is available for anyone to download, but you have to be a Discovery member with at least one active Discovery product and must register on the Discovery website (www.discovery.co.za) before you can log in to the Discovery app. You will use the same username and password for this app as for the Discovery website.

If you are not registered on the Discovery website, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/register to register.

To find out how we use the device features requested in the permissions, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/discovery-app-permissions

For known issues and current system status, visit https://www.discovery.co.za/portal/individual/help
descriptionShort: The Discovery app provides a convenient way to access your information

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Discovery Insure clients can now instantly add Scratch and Dent cover and submit claims for this.

We have also made some general enhancements.
